verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:3
verses.text: Your eyes have seen what the Lord did because of Baal–peor: for all the men that followed Baal–peor, the Lord thy God hath destroyed them from among you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:4
verses.text: But ye that did cleave unto the Lord your God are alive every one of you this day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:5
verses.text: Behold, I have taught you statutes and judgments, even as the Lord my God commanded me, that ye should do so in the land whither ye go to possess it.
